title: [Resolved] bring up client/userkernel problems
body:
hey so ever since last patch I've been having problems opening lol client. it comes up saying something about my user kernel not working properly (not computer smart, the message is to high tech for me to understand)
anyway i looked around and eventually find a temporarily fix where i go in to my applications - open lol - contents - LOL - RADS - system, and then i go to my  download of league of legends and transfer the 'UserKErnel' from the same 'contents - LOL - RADS - system' folder to the lol folder in my applications. 
( use a mac )
now this has worked but i have to do this every time i turn my computer on again and its getting quite annoying. does anyone know how to permanently fix this?

replies.body:
Hey Darth R2,

After you temporarily fix the issue, can you try repairing your client? If you're unsure how to do so, follow the steps in the following guide (same steps on both Mac and Windows):

http://kb.leaguevolunteers.com/tech:repairing_client

seems to be working normal for now :)

thanks wuks
